description: Schema for providing rich, human-readable, and domain-specific status updates (dev.ocs.order.detailed_status@1.0).

title.description: The primary, human-readable status text to display to the user (e.g., 'In the Oven', 'Awaiting Proof Approval').

description.description: An optional, longer description providing more context (e.g., 'Your pizza is being baked to perfection and will be ready soon!').

progressPercentage.description: An optional value from 0-100 to power UI elements like progress bars.

estimatedCompletionAt.description: An optional timestamp for when this specific stage is expected to be complete.
